// URL : https://www.codechef.com/problems/RRMATRIX

#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

long long gcd(long long a, long long b)
{
	if(b == 0)return a;
	else gcd(b, a % b);
}

int main()
{
	int tc;
	cin >> tc;
	while(tc--)
	{
		long long n, m;
		cin >> n >> m;
		if(n == 1 || m == 1)
		{
			cout << max(m, n) << endl;
			continue;
		}
		long long g = gcd(n - 1, m - 1);
		cout << g + 1 << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
